alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 6:08PM CDT until June 03 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 607 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Walker, or 8 miles southeast of Denham Springs, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Denham Springs, Walker, French Settlement and Port Vincent. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 12 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm please use caution on roadways.
